attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in the conservative party, 33% isn't a majority
attributes.additional_details: See the percentage of voters and the proportion of votes for other parties such as ukip and green party clearly opposed to the conservative party ideals.
attributes.background: proportionally more votes went to other parties with policies completely opposing the conservative agenda and austerity, the country has no confidence in this party and oppose it's ideals heavily.

rejection.details:
We don't think that a petition for a vote of no confidence in the House of Commons on the Conservative Party would be effective.

We think that what you want the petition to do is to press for a vote of no confidence in the House of Commons on the Prime Minister and/or the Conservative Government he leads.

If you would like to redraft and resubmit your petition it will be reconsidered.
